tool_description: Analyzes scriptural texts to extract linguistic features such as syntax patterns, vocabulary complexity, literary devices, and grammatical structures.

text.description: The scriptural text to analyze linguistically

language.description: Language of the text for appropriate linguistic analysis

analysis_depth.description: Depth of analysis: basic, intermediate, comprehensive

extract_keywords.description: Extract and rank key terms and concepts

error_messages: Text too short: Provide at least 20 words for meaningful linguistic analysis.
Unsupported language: The specified language is not supported for detailed analysis.
Invalid analysis depth: Use one of [basic, intermediate, comprehensive].
Empty text: Text parameter cannot be empty or whitespace only.
usage: Input text with its language and choose analysis depth and optional features. Returns comprehensive linguistic feature analysis including vocabulary, syntax, and stylistic elements.

vocabulary_complexity.description: Assessment of vocabulary difficulty and complexity

sentence_structure.description: Analysis of sentence patterns and syntactic complexity

key_terms.description: Most significant terms and concepts identified
